page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: { The area around our school is a mixture of farm land and residential areas.There are lots of private housing estates - Hunters Chase The Rise etc. Some of these houses are Summer homes as lots of visitors come to the area.There are quite a few caravan parks - Trearddur Farm , Gwynfair , Bagnall etc.Lots of people stay in hotels - The Beach , The Trearddur Bay , The Seacroft etc. Our area is very busy in Summer but is much quieter in Winter.Lots of the residents are retired people and the other residents work in Holyhead.Most householders have their own cars. The farms grow crops - wheat , barley etc and keep animals - cows , sheep etc.Lots of the farmland is owned by Anglesey Aluminium who have a large plant near the area
